channel.title: Software on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Software on My New Hugo Site

item.title: PlantUML
item.description: Play with the online server without installation. Prerequisite: $ sudo apt install default-jre graphviz $ java -version openjdk version "11.0.8" 2020-07-14 OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 11.0.8+10-post-Ubuntu-0ubuntu120.04) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 11.0.8+10-post-Ubuntu-0ubuntu120.04, mixed mode, sharing) Installation: Download the PlantUML compiled Jar. $ java -jar ~/opt/plantuml.1.2020.16.jar -version PlantUML version 1.2020.16 (Mon Aug 24 04:20:43 CST 2020) (GPL source distribution) Java Runtime: OpenJDK Runtime Environment JVM: OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Default Encoding: UTF-8 Language: en Country: US PLANTUML_LIMIT_SIZE: 4096 Dot version: dot - graphviz version 2.
